hotels.title: Heritage Spain Country Elegance in the Heart of Basque
hotels.description: Discover pure elegance at the restored 17th-century Iriarte Jauregia Hotel, a gorgeous country estate nestled between mountains in the heart of Spain’s culture-rich Basque Country. An alluring mix of traditional décor, antique furniture, crackling fireplaces and immaculate, expansive gardens creates a warm and cosy atmosphere you’ll never want to leave. Dine at the hotel’s Bailara restaurant for a trip to foodie heaven: think mouthwatering, traditional Basque cuisine meets creative avant-garde innovation. Set along Spain’s northern Atlantic coast, the magical Basque Country is where fairytale villages, ultra-modern architectural sites and a world-renowned gastronomy scene come together. Rent a car and follow the dramatic clifftop roads past stunning coastal scenery to highlights like the Guggenheim Museum Bilbao and tempranillo wine regions, with countless medieval towns along the way.
